name: Warehouse Wander
description:
Your a cop who has been called to a warehouse where strange noises have been heard. Your job is go inside and investigate... sounds simple right? Get your keys and get out!

CREDITS:

All sfx and music is from freesound.org

All Pixel Art and assets are made by me from scratch just for this jam, this was created by 1 person which is myself (I'm a solo dev)

 This was made in less than 72 hours for the Lost Cartridge Jam

This game is inspired by Puppet Combo!

NOTICE:

This game might get changes since it was kinda rushed, hope you like it though!

The game might get a remastered or a sequel if that is wanted!

The key after the green door is for the golden door(I forgot to change the color).

Discord: Xeyo#2113

Please also check out my other finished horror game (i worked awfully hard making it):

https://xezien.itch.io/lost-and-found
